name: CVE-2022-32590
description: In wlan, there is a possible use after free due to an incorrect status check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07299425; Issue ID: ALPS07299425.
